Quickstrike:






Quickstrike screamed as he was thrown into the room. It bent under his body 
and sparks flew from it. He rolled his head, and closed his eyes tightly. 
And when he opened them, he saw Megatron by a CR tank. His eyes lit up for a 
few seconds, then he began thinking. Would Megatron treat him so nicely. 
Maybe just for this time.

He slowly nodded, his eyes no longer with their fighting spunk. He picked 
himself up, carefully raising his body up. He stood first, eyeing Megatron, 
then hopped over to the tank. He put his leg down it first, and felt the 
cooling, soothing sensation on it, then slipped in.
